Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Harper
ShortDescription: WB 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via S. Hyde Park, 55th, Lake Park, Hyde Park, Woodlawn and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via South Hyde Park, 55th, Lake Park, Hyde Park, Woodlawn and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Harper.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
